result.execSummary:
The defendant Daniel J Downey was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Fine and costs shall be paid at the rate of $25/month commencing June 1, 2015 and the 1st of each month thereafter until paid in full.    There is a $15 administrative fee for any payment plan and any change to a payment plan. The fee will be added to the first payment. If not paid, a judgment shall be entered.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Daniel J Downey

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Daniel J Downey
Current: 155 Poygan Rd, Omro, WI 54963 United States  (Effective: 03-01-2017)
Prior: 506 Wisconsin St, Redgranite, WI 54970 United States
Documents verified with scanning; Paper file destroyed, retained electronically (scanned).

Def appeared in person.  Atty Sandra Jo Giernoth for State.  Clerk: CP.  Def given complaint, advised of charges, penalties and rights, and probable cause found.  Def does not have valid DL.  Def waives right to counsel; Court accepts waiver.  Recess.  Reconvene.  Pretrial held; agreement reached.  Def continues atty waiver; Court accepts waiver.  Def enters guilty plea.  Court finds def guilty.  Court imposes fine of $505 to be paid at the rate of $25/month commencing 6-1-15.

ADDRESS INFO for Daniel J Downey
Current: 506 Wisconsin St, Redgranite, WI 54970 United States  (Effective: 04-23-2015)
Prior: 678 Foxtree Circle #1, Burlington, WI 53105 United States

Def, Daniel J Downey not appearing.  Atty Mandy A. Schepper for State.  Clerk: CP.  Def contacted Court previously to indicate he could not come to Court due to not having transportation.  Court adj.  Initial appearance scheduled for April 23, 2015 at 03:30 pm.

Def called to say he was not aware of hearing set 4-13-15 at 8:15am until just today as previous girlfriend did not forward his mail; also stated he did not have a vehicle or money for transportation to hearing on Monday.  He was provided w/fax # to put request to reschedule in writing and informed if he did not appear a warrant could issue.
